channel.title: Torrents and Warez Illegal or not
channel.description: Well im just wondering how does it make it illegal is it possible to be arrested ?? if you are using Torrents or Warez and Why Cool And i dont/(lie) use warez or torrents

item.title: Torrents and Warez Illegal or not
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Downloading torrents and such isn’t a big deal, it’s when you become a massive seeder you’ll get caught. Warez is the same, your more likely to get a virus than in any real trouble. Just don’t get cocky though, a lot of ISPs have rules against this sort of thing and people can easily report you.

Read full topic
item.source: Torrents and Warez Illegal or not

item.title: Torrents and Warez Illegal or not

item.description:
@sidishere wrote:

its illegal to download movies and stuff from torrents and its very unlikey you will get arrested. and why? because you have to acctually pay for the stuff and its illegal to download it as a freeware cracked/patched or with a serial.
